title: Game of NoaLeGeek
textState.newGame: Press New Game to start a game
buttonRules.rules:
- The first player to line up 3 identical symbols wins the game.
- A tie occurs when the grid is completed without a winner.
- The first player always starts with the X symbol.

Variants:
- The alignment size can be changed between 2 and the grid size.
- Grid size can be modified between 2 and 10.
- Si la taille de l'alignement a été modifiée, alors le premier joueur à aligner la taille de l'alignement choisie gagne la partie.
buttonAbout.about:

1ère NSI - Lycée Louis Armand - Mulhouse
